articles.title: Taiwan Dec export orders seen rising for 22nd month in a row - Reuters
articles.description: Taiwan's export orders likely rose in December for the 22nd straight month albeit at a slower pace, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, due to supply chain issues and off last year's high base.

articles.title: Apple Prepares Fix for Safari Bug Allowing Websites to Decipher Your Recent Browsing Activity
articles.description:
Over the weekend, we reported on a bug in WebKit's implementation of a JavaScript API called IndexedDB that can reveal your recent browsing history and even your identity, according to browser fingerprinting service FingerprintJS.

articles.title: なんと。新型iPad AirがiPhone SE（第3世代）と一緒に発表されるかも
